com.amazonaws.kinesisvideo.client.mediasource

Interface MediaSource

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AndroidCameraMediaSource, BytesMediaSource

    public interface MediaSource
    Interface representing a media source.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      void configure(MediaSourceConfiguration configuration)
      Configures the media source
      void free()
      Releases resources

      Returns the MediaSourceConfiguration used to create this media source

      Returns the MediaSourceState

      Initializes the media source with a MediaSourceSink object
      boolean isStopped()
      Returns true if media source is now stopped
      void start()
      Starts the media source
      void stop()
      Stops the media source
